qualityImprovementSuggestion.mission: Our mission is superior consumer satisfaction
values: Do Right Things Right The First Time

suggestion.description: The current system of managing records is too complex. Specific, when we should be getting more general. Right now people must work to understand the system. We must spend too much time administering the system labeling, and cleaning our files. Complying is a real burden, both for the individual and for the records coordinators.
